Description:
Bay Hills Apartments is a beautiful Arnold community with fantastic views overlooking the Bay Hills golf course!
* Brand new full sized washers and dryers
* Updated kitchens
* Brand new bright entryways and more! Nestled in a large residential area, parents will appreciate the highly coveted Broadneck school district. And it's just a short hop to Anne Arundel Community College, the Naval Academy and Annapolis. These Anne Arundel County apartments offer unique floor plans, lots of space for entertaining, and huge storage areas. You'll also have access to the Bay Hills community pool, golf course, and the Magothy River, and Sandy Point State Park is right down the street. Easy access to Annapolis without Annapolis rates! * On-site Bay Hills property management office for your convenience
* A&G Management Company's 24/7 Blue Ribbon maintenance service provided
* Laundry care centers just for Bay Hills residents
* Community-owned golf course and swimming club close by & available to Bay Hills residents for a fee
* Playground
* Picnic area
* Grilling area
* Very Pet Friendly "Bark Park" for your dog to run and play
* Ample parking
* Military, Veteran, Police, Fire, Teacher, Hospital Employee and Senior discounts
* Convenient online rental payment option
* Flexible lease terms
* Planned community events
* Quarterly Bay Hills community newsletters
* Scenic golf course view
* Excellent location just minutes from Annapolis.
* Convenient to Baltimore & Washington, DC
* Minutes to Bay Hills Shopping Center
* Minutes from the scenic Magothy and Severn rivers
* Pet friendly
